the handle a third gripping region on the second front end portion of the housing and offset rearward from first front end portion a fourth gripping region on the rear end portion of the distal portion of the handle a fifth gripping region on the front wall portion of the distal portion of handle adjacent the trigger and a sixth gripping region on the front wall portion of the distal portion of the handle distal of the fifth gripping region wherein the handle has a first depth from the trigger to the convex gripping surface a second depth from the fifth gripping region to the fourth gripping region and a third depth from the sixth gripping region to the fourth gripping region the first depth being greater than the second depth and the second depth being greater than the third
